repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (June 2021).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

extent.note: The leaves are broader in their middle than at their edges.

collation.desc: the front cover. Shelfmark and sticker on recto.
1 folio = Title Page (additional). No foliation. Verso blank. Shelfmark on recto.
1 folio = Mayilattiruppukaḻ: Invocation. No foliation. Tamil foliation (right margin) 1.
50 folios = Mayilattiruppukaḻ: Text. Tamil foliation (left margin) {1}, 2-281, 282, 29-411, 412, 413, 44-47. Tamil foliation (right margin) 2-51.
6 folios = back guard leaves. No foliation. Blank recto verso. f[5]v more dark = outside page of original bundle.

supportDesc.condition: Poor state of preservation. Many boreholes. Fragile leaves.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 244 (front cover, recto).
BnF donation sticker DON N° (front cover, recto).
Sticker (Société Asiatique?) with shelfmark 694 inscribed in black ink (f[1]r).

Total stanzas table (no title; 1 column): total stanzas (pāṭal) per tiruppukaḻ, total stanzas for the three tiruppukaḻs. Note that the table is given right after the end of the text on the same page (not, as usual, on its own page). By the original copyist.See details below.

binding.p: Pinewood covers apparently fabricated in the BnF.

origin.origDate: Dated to year tāraṇa of the Jovian cycle, that is, CE 1824-1825 1764-1765 1704-1705, etc. Not dated by Vinson (1868) nor by Cabaton (1912).

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. — See BnF, Département des Manuscrits, Inventaire 7 = dons : manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, n° 1 à 3306: no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois et malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 38, no. 244.
James, Gregory. 2000. Colporuḷ: A History of Tamil Dictionaries. 1st edition. Chennai: Cre-A. — See p. 705.
Rosny, Léon de. 1868. La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In Variétés orientales, 177‒224. Paris: Maisonneuve.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 57r, no. 228 244.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, May 2022.
